seoDescription: Plan your NYC adventure with Koala Escapes. Find top hotels, explore neighborhoods, and book instantly via Booking.com.
intro: New York is more than skyscrapers and yellow taxis. It’s street food in Queens, art in Chelsea, jazz in Harlem, and sunsets from Brooklyn rooftops. Whether you're a first-timer or a seasoned city lover, there’s always something new to see, do, or taste. Get lost in the energy, and let the city move you.
